Sentence_SocialFightStarted.rulePack.rul.li: sent->This drove [recipient_nameShortDef] into a rage and [recipient_pronoun] began a fight!

Sentence_MarriageProposalRejectedBrokeUp.li: sent->It was too much for the relationship to continue, and the two have now broken up.
